authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

list.name: list
list.description: The list that is gonna fire the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
list.ai_hint: The list that is gonna fire the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

events.name: events
events.description: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled

options.name: Campaign Sent
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a campaign is sent or cancelled

options.name: Cleaned
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is cleaned from the list

options.name: Email Address Updated
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is changed

options.name: Profile Updated
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's profile is updated

options.name: Subscribe
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a list subscriber is added

options.name: Unsubscribe
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a list member unsubscribes

events.ai_hint: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled

sources.name: sources
sources.description: The possible sources of any events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled

options.name: User
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by subscriber-initiated actions

options.name: Admin
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by admin-initiated actions in the web interface

options.name: API
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by actions initiated via the API

sources.ai_hint: The possible sources of any events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled
